name: Marshmallow Bounce
description:
Play Free Games on:
http://www.myarcadegames.net

In Marshmallow Bounce players enter a magical candy factory where all of the delicious edibles are alive. Unfortunately there’s some funny business going on near the marshmallow conveyor belt that requires immediate attention. The marshmallow men have figured out a way to bounce and escape! It’s up to players to control the machine and make sure every marshmallow makes it into the mixing bowl.
